name: Greater Heal
description: Slow casting spell that heals a single target for ${powerMin} to ${powerMax}.

author.name: Ozgar
author.description: Founder and creator of Ozgar's Downranking Guide & Tool.

notes.note: Greater Heal is your most powerful single target heal, and appropriate for steady healing. I always keep Rank 1, Rank 3 and Max Rank on my bars, using them depending on how much healing the situation demands. Greater Heal will replace Heal when your target is taking too much damage, and you need that extra throughput. Greater Heal will become even more powerful once you get the 8 piece set bonus from [Vestments of Transcendence].
